column2: (let ((th (make-thread (lambda nil nil)))) (thread-join th) (if (memq th (all-threads)) t nil))
(let ((a (make-thread (lambda nil nil))) (b (make-thread (lambda nil nil)))) (list (eq (car (all-threads)) (current-thread)) (if (memq a (all-threads)) t nil) (if (memq b (all-threads)) t nil)))
